items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top of the Line!
items.body: Looks and feels wonderful! It was packaged very professionally! Read more
items.author: David R. Mclauchlan Jr.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exquisite sweater - one of the nicest I have seen - almost entirely with Cashmere wool
items.body: This is a review of the KVSS branded Women's Cashmere Sweater. It is a ribbed, long sleeve turtleneck made from 93% Cashmere, 6% Nylon, 1% Spandex. Makes for a very nice luxurious feel. The Cashmere is a luxurious feeling, ultra-soft, warm fiber. It comes from the fine undercoat of cashmere goats. In this case, the manufacture sources it from Inner Mongolia. That is an autonomous region in China. Goat herding is their main industry. The 6% nylon adds structure. The 1% spandex so the sweater returns shapeliness when removed. It all makes for a very pretty fabric. The box it came in was a surprise. A gift worthy nice presentation box. It is dark on the bottom and off white on top. Tied with a string bow. Summary: One of the nicest sweaters I have seen and comes in a presentation gift box. Read more
items.author: Intrepid

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm very happy with this cashmere sweater but then I have nothing to compare it to.
items.body: I absolutely adore this cashmere sweater from KVSS. This sweater looks good on because it's made to fit right. The sleeves are long enough so that the cuffs come right up to the base of your hand and there is a little fabric left over so that they gently bunch up on your forearms creating a "cozy" appearance. Same with the hem and the turtleneck neckline. The cashmere fabric is soft but does have a bit of the inherent wool scratchiness. It is my understanding (my first ever cashmere anything) that it will get softer, and the scratchiness will go away with wearing and washing. The color of this sweater wouldn't be my first choice, but I just learned that the natural colors reflect the wool's natural color and that dyeing can make the wool stiffer. Good to know! As far as sizing goes, I would say this brand is true to size. I normally wear an XL which wasn't available, so I went ahead and got the Large. It could be a bit looser across the chest! For reference, I am 5'7" and in this picture was about 180 lbs. I've since lost some weight (unfortunately some of it came off in the chest) so the Large will be perfect now. Read more
items.author: Mary S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LVSS Mongolian Cashmere Sweater, Lhasa in L
items.body: I’m very glad to have ordered this sweater. I tested it out in a snowstorm and it kept me very toasty. I was noticeably cooler when I took it off. I ordered up because sometimes when it’s looser, it seems to be warmer or maybe that’s just me. But the fabric is very nice, the color is similar to a dark beige-tan. It is not very thick, which is great because it’s still warm, but you can layer if so desired. The sweaters are true to size Read more
items.author: Amazon Username

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, luxurious cashmere sweater
items.body: This is a very luxurious sweater. I love the color and the soft cashmere. This is one of the best cashmere sweater. It looks beautiful and helps accentuates the curves. Looks professional and very elegant. I love it and you won't disappointed. Read more
items.author: Syd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Premium feel, but snug fit
items.body: This sweater is made from high quality cashmere and feels very soft to the touch and well made as far as the stitching goes. The packaging was excellent, and the overall presentation gave a premium impression right out of the box. It's very giftable as a result since it comes inside of a gift box already. The sizing does run a little snug, but it’s still wearable and comfortable once on. The millet color is very nice too since it's neutral and versatile enough to pair with just about anything. Overall, this is a beautiful sweater that feels worth the investment. It's probably one of the most premium feeling pieces I have in my wardrobe right now. Read more
items.author: G Ross

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spectacular cashmere sweater!
items.body: This is a spectacular cashmere turtleneck sweater. It’s soft as you would expect cashmere to be. The neck felt a little itchy at first but that may be because I haven’t worn turtlenecks in a while. You can feel the high quality by the design and the way it fits. It’s so flattering and attractive. It sits so nicely and feels so soft. It’s incredibly well made. It fits true to size and is a rich beige color. The turtleneck is perfect. It’s not too loose and not too tight. The sleeves are fitted at the cuff and it’s fitted at the waist. It comes in a beautiful gift box ready to go for the holidays. This would be a show stopping gift. Read more
items.author: Jill H.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Taibai, Otter, Millet, Black, Slate. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
